/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of daylight. Cars of different shapes and colors are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
